meanings.definition: To exceed or surpass the requirements or expectations
meanings.sent1: She overfulfills her daily tasks by finishing them ahead of time.
meanings.sent2: The team overfulfills their sales target every month.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel overfulfills its nut-gathering mission by collecting extra for winter.
meanings.sent4: His dedication overfulfills the standard, setting a new level of excellence.
meanings.sent5: The sun overfulfills its duty by shining brightly every day.

meanings.definition: To complete or achieve more than what is necessary or expected
meanings.sent1: The baker overfulfills the order by adding extra pastries for free.
meanings.sent2: She always overfulfills her promises, going above and beyond for her friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat overfulfills its nap quota by sleeping through the entire afternoon.
meanings.sent4: His creativity overfulfills the canvas, creating a masterpiece beyond imagination.
meanings.sent5: The river overfulfills its banks during heavy rains, causing flooding in the area.
